name: The Rural Socials & Economics Empowerment
briefDescription: 1. To render services for the welfare of the society/association in General.2. To arrange and held periodical lecture, discussion, seminar,Conference and workshops for the development of literate and Illiterate person.3.  To empower the women through education, self help,     Cooperative, Net work and to access rights. 4. To promote education, Awareness, Skills and IT through establish The educational institutions, Canters, Hostels and vocational 5. to run productions cum training center under self employment Programmed 6. control hiv/aids and disease to to develop on green, agriculture,livelihood, and living condition9th Committee Baord1.
